name: Which Springfield? Multiple Choice Quiz | USA | 10 Questions

questions.text: In which Springfield would you find the Basketball Hall of Fame?
In what state is Springfield that state's capital?
What Springfield is the home of Wittenberg University?
The Springfield in this state is home to 'the world's greatest sporting goods store'. Which Springfield is famous for the Bass Pro Shop Outdoor World and Museum?
Springfield, Illinois was the home of which American president?
What famous road runs through both Springfield, Illinois and Springfield, Missouri?
In which Springfield would you find the Eureka Schoolhouse (a one room school house built in 1785) nestled in the Green Mountains?
The citizens of which Springfield would most likely cheer for 'the Ducks'?
questions.explanation:
Springfield, Oregon.

	Springfield, Oregon is next to Eugene, Oregon, home of the University of Oregon. There sports teams are known as the Ducks.

questions.text: Which Springfield would you visit to attend the 'Tobacco Belt Antique Car Show'?
questions.explanation:
Springfield, Tennessee.

	Springfield is north of Nashville. Several Country Music stars live in the area.

questions.text: Which Springfield is home to the second most visited cemetery in the US?
questions.explanation:
Springfield, Illinois.

	Oak Ridge Cemetery is the place where Abraham Lincoln and most of his family are buried. This cemetery is second only to Arlington National Cemetery, in the number of visitors it receives each year.
